featured.text: It was at the end of one of these long voyages that the pineapple came to Hawaii to stay.
It is not immediately known whether the “Kawasaki” can be repaired on the fishing island of Penghu, or when the Vladimirs will be able to set off again and continue their around-the-world voyage.

Their voyage, down the coastline of northeastern mainland China, through the East China Sea, then down the Taiwan Strait and into the South China Sea, had been smooth until four days ago when the mainsail of their twin-mast sailboat “Kawasaki” was smashed by strong winds on the high seas.
In 1498, Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama made the first sea voyage to India, via the southernmost tip of Africa.

other.text: When did the “Kawasaki” first get into trouble during the voyage? (A) Less than two days after departure from Russia.
It was carried on sailing ships around the world because it was found to help prevent scurvy, a disease that often 25 sailors on long voyages.
What was the purpose of the voyage of the Vladimirs? (A)

definition.zh_def: 航行；旅行，特別是長途旅行
definition.en_def: A long journey involving travel by sea or in space.
definition.example: They embarked on a voyage across the Atlantic Ocean.
